title: Knight of the Sea - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Calm Protagonist   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Mystery Solving   Older Love Interests   Pirates   Politics   Rebellion   Schemes And Conspiracies   Wars
author: 七药
description:
Hai Lian: If I lined up all of Fang Tinglan’s lies, they would wrap all the way around the coastlines.

Fang Tinglan: “I love you” doesn’t count.

Hai Lian: That’s included too.

Fang Tinglan: …



A tale of pirates, assassins, military coups, and loving while fighting unfolds.>
